page.name: NoteWorthy
page.description: NoteWorthy is an auditioned pop a cappella ensemble that meets FIRST semester after school on WEDNESDAYS from 2:35-3:30 in the MMS Choir Room 609.  Auditions are scheduled in early September and are open to any MMS student.  There is a $35 club fee for NoteWorthy (no student will be refused due to financial hardship).  NoteWorthy performs in the A Cappella Clinic (Oct.) the 7th and 8th grade choral concerts (Dec.) and the MHS Elegant Holiday (Dec.).
